check_your_email_to_confirm_your_account: Check your email to confirm your account.
choose_the_plan_that_works_for_you_no_hi: Elige el plan que mejor se adapte a ti. Sin costes ocultos.
dictate_four_times_faster_using_your_voi: Dicta cuatro veces más rápido usando tu voz.
for_individuals_who_want_fast_local_dict: 빠르고 로컬 받아쓰기를 원하는 개인 사용자용.
free_to_use_no_credit_card_required: Uso gratuito. Sin tarjeta de crédito.
full_power_with_cloud_transcription_and_: 클라우드 전사 및 고급 통합 기능을 갖춘 완전한 성능.
here_s_a_really_long_sentence_that_i_hav: Aquí hay una oración realmente larga que tengo que escribir y simplemente sigue y sigue para siempre.
install_vocally_on_macos_windows_or_linu: macOS, Windows 또는 Linux에 Vocally를 설치하고 지금 바로 AI 받아쓰기를 시작하세요.
installer_for_all_macos_architectures: Instalador para todas las arquitecturas de macOS
make_voice_your_new_keyboard: Haz de la voz tu nuevo teclado.
make_voice_your_new_keyboard_type_four_t: Convierte tu voz en tu nuevo teclado. Escribe cuatro veces más rápido usando tu voz.
other_dictation_tools_send_your_audio_st: Otras herramientas de dictado envían tu audio directamente a la nube. Vocally puede funcionar completamente en tu dispositivo: tus palabras nunca salen de tu máquina. Modo avión, sin conexión, donde sea. Simplemente funciona.
process_everything_locally_on_your_devic: Process everything locally on your device, bring your own API key, or connect to our cloud. Don't believe us? See for yourself. Vocally is fully open-source.
simple_transparent_pricing_for_vocally_f: Simple, transparent pricing for Vocally. Free personal plan, $5/month or $50/year Pro plan, and custom enterprise solutions.
sorry_we_couldn_t_find_that_page: Lo sentimos, no pudimos encontrar esa página.
type_four_times_faster_with_a_voice_firs: Escribe cuatro veces más rápido con un teclado de voz.
vocally_uses_ai_to_clean_up_your_transcr: Vocally은 AI를 사용해 텍스트를 정리합니다. 군더더기 단어, 머뭇거림, 잘못된 시작 등을 제거합니다. 자연스럽게 말하세요, Vocally이 나머지를 처리합니다.
vocally_works_system_wide_across_macos_w: Vocally works system-wide across macOS, Windows, and Linux. Any text field, any application—your voice just works.
vocally_your_keyboard_is_holding_you_bac: Vocally | Tu teclado te está frenando
we_couldn_t_find_the_page_you_were_looki: No pudimos encontrar la página que buscabas.
works_at_the_speed_of_thought: Funciona a la velocidad del pensamiento.
your_checkout_was_cancelled_no_charges_w: Your checkout was cancelled. No charges were made.
your_checkout_was_cancelled_you_can_try_: Your checkout was cancelled. You can try again.
your_email_has_been_confirmed_you_can_no: Your email has been confirmed. You can now sign in to the Vocally app.
your_email_has_been_verified_successfull: Your email has been verified successfully. You can now go back to the Vocally app and sign in.
your_pro_plan_is_now_active_download_the: Your Pro plan is now active. Download the app to get started.
your_thoughts_move_faster_than_your_fing: Tus pensamientos van más rápido que tus dedos. Deja de perder ideas por escribir lento. Di lo que piensas y sigue adelante.
your_vocally_pro_subscription_is_now_act: Your Vocally Pro subscription is now active.
your_voice_outruns_your_keyboard: Tu voz supera a tu teclado.
